name: Devil's Talk
description:
An infinite runner with two rules that change randomly over time.

*** RETRY BUTTON IN BROWSER VERSION IS BUGGED *** I know this sucks but refresh the page to retry!

The devil wants your soul, and he will try to decieve you to get it

Spheres are to restore/drain your soul

Diamonds are to speed/slow things up

Meditate to go through barriers

The devil sets the rules, but don't trust him!

Controls:

->, <-,  A, D:  Move

Space:  Meditate

Music: 

Danse Macabre by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3601-danse-macabre
